column1: srftoy 161007218701 "2017-05-24 02:59:44 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/161007218701/quotes-life-pain "“It hurts to love. It’s like giving yourself to be flayed and knowing that at any moment the other person may just walk off with your skin.”- Susan Sontag" True text

srftoy 160572962701 "2017-05-12 03:40:57 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/160572962701/books-quotes-vision-quest "“Sometimes this experience comes back to me in reverie and sometimes it comes back as a real dream. It’s changed a lot since the night of the picnic when I first dreamed it and when it got stuck maybe forever in my memory. I guess it’s become what I need it to be rather than what it really was. I don’t even remember exactly how the day went anymore.”Vision Quest by Terry Davis" True text

column1: srftoy 160107488621 "2017-04-29 04:41:16 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/160107488621/quotes-life-lessons "From the backstabbing co-worker to the meddling sister-in-law
column2: you are in charge of how you react to the people and events in your life. You can either give negativity power over your life or you can choose happiness instead. Take control and choose to focus on what is important in your life. Those who cannot live fully often become destroyers of life.- ANAÏS NIN" True text

column1: srftoy 159965555956 "2017-04-25 04:45:05 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/159965555956/life-lessons-quotes-buddha "“Doubt everything. Find your own light.”The Buddha" True text

srftoy 159916723511 "2017-04-23 22:53:49 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/159916723511/quotes-life-tv-stars "Ralph Waldo Emerson once asked what we would do if the stars only came out once every thousand years. No one would sleep that night
column2: of course. The world would become religious overnight. We would be ecstatic
column4: made rapturous by the glory of God. Instead the stars come out every night
column5: and we watch television.- Paul Hawken" True text

column1: srftoy 159850075131 "2017-04-22 04:04:03 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/159850075131/quotes-life-words-simple "“One day I will find the right words

column1: srftoy 159719059096 "2017-04-18 15:47:47 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/159719059096/thoughts-work-funny-cpe "I’m watching a webinar for continuing education today at work - and it’s so funny - they are acting like they are having an off the cuff conversation - but when they are talking they are reading everything in a monotone voice - the whole thing is a script - from - I’m so happy to be here today - to - that was a really important question

column2: caring relatively little whether people approve or disapprove.”- Vincent Van Gogh" True text

srftoy 159512951121 "2017-04-13 02:53:53 GMT" http://davesword.com/post/159512951121/travel-thoughts-food-new-orleans "It’s been a busy trip - and hard to keep up with the blogging - with the normal wifi issues and time issues and tired issues - we’ve done a lot
column3: here in New Orleans - lots of music and food - walking tours and streetcar rides - a very little bit of gambling - a fair amount of drinking - and even got to walk through an open set of NCIS right in the French Quarter - time to go home tomorrow
column5: so we can get some rest…" True text
